SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.AUTHORITY, M.MEMBER_DEL_FL, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, REPORT_NO, REPORT_MEMBER_NO, REPORT_TARGET_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_PENALTY, PROCESS_DATE, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TARGET_NO ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC) AS RANKING, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TARGET_NO ORDER BY REPORT_NO) AS REPORT_VOLUME, B.BOARD_NO, BOARD_DEL_FL, POST_NO, POST_DEL_FL, REPORT_TYPE, COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'M' THEN M.MEMBER_NO WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'B' THEN B.BOARD_NO WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'P' THEN POST_NO WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN COMMENT_NO END ) CONTENT_NO, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'B' THEN BOARD_TITLE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'P' THEN POST_TITLE END ) TITLE, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'B' THEN BOARD_CONTENT WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'P' THEN POST_CONTENT WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN COMMENT_CONTENT END ) CONTENT, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN MC.MEMBER_ID END ) COMMENT_MEMBER_ID, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN C.BOARD_NO END ) COMMENT_BOARD_NO, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'B' THEN BOARD_TYPE_NO WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN (SELECT BOARD_TYPE_NO FROM BOARD b WHERE b.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO) END ) BOARD_TYPE FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON(REPORT_TARGET_NO = BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(REPORT_TARGET_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN POST ON(REPORT_TARGET_NO = POST_NO) LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON(REPORT_TARGET_NO = COMMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER MC ON(MC.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO)) WHERE REPORT_PENALTY IS NULL AND RANKING = 1
ORDER BY REPORT_VOLUME ASC, REPORT_NO DESC
ORDER BY REPORT_VOLUME DESC, REPORT_NO DESC
ORDER BY REPORT_NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.AUTHORITY, M.MEMBER_DEL_FL, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, REPORT_NO, REPORT_MEMBER_NO, REPORT_TARGET_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_PENALTY, PROCESS_DATE, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TARGET_NO ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC) AS RANKING, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TARGET_NO ORDER BY REPORT_NO) AS REPORT_VOLUME, B.BOARD_NO, BOARD_DEL_FL, POST_NO, POST_DEL_FL, REPORT_TYPE, COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'M' THEN M.MEMBER_NO WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'B' THEN B.BOARD_NO WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'P' THEN POST_NO WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN COMMENT_NO END ) CONTENT_NO, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'B' THEN BOARD_TITLE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'P' THEN POST_TITLE END ) TITLE, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'B' THEN BOARD_CONTENT WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'P' THEN POST_CONTENT WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN COMMENT_CONTENT END ) CONTENT, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN MC.MEMBER_ID END ) COMMENT_MEMBER_ID, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN C.BOARD_NO END ) COMMENT_BOARD_NO, (CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'B' THEN BOARD_TYPE_NO WHEN REPORT_TYPE = 'C' THEN (SELECT BOARD_TYPE_NO FROM BOARD b WHERE b.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO) END ) BOARD_TYPE FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON(REPORT_TARGET_NO = BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(REPORT_TARGET_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN POST ON(REPORT_TARGET_NO = POST_NO) LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON(REPORT_TARGET_NO = COMMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER MC ON(MC.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO)) WHERE RANKING = 1
AND (LOWER(MEMBER_ID) LIKE LOWER('%${keyword}%') OR MEMBER_NO LIKE ('%${keyword}%') OR LOWER(TITLE) LIKE ('%${keyword}%'))

AND REPORT_PENALTY = 'N'
AND ((REPORT_PENALTY = 'Y' OR REPORT_PENALTY = 'A') AND REPORT_TYPE = 'M' AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N')
AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'Y'
AND (REPORT_PENALTY = 'Y' AND (REPORT_TYPE = 'B' OR REPORT_TYPE = 'P' OR REPORT_TYPE = 'C'))
ORDER BY REPORT_NO
AND REPORT_TYPE = 'M' AND AUTHORITY = 0
AND REPORT_TYPE = 'M' AND AUTHORITY = 1
AND REPORT_TYPE = 'P'
AND REPORT_TYPE = 'B'
AND REPORT_TYPE = 'C'
ORDER BY REPORT_VOLUME ASC, REPORT_NO DESC
ORDER BY REPORT_VOLUME DESC, REPORT_NO DESC
ORDER BY REPORT_NO
